solsticeDesc: Pagan traditions observe the first day of late spring as Beltane, a celebration of fertility. Beltane is a great time to take action on projects, creative and otherwise. Symbols include dairy, honey, and oats; flowers, and honey bees.

solsticeIdeas.text: Start a new project, or put new energy into an existing one
Go for a neighborhood walk and look for blossoms
Have a bonfire with loved ones
Drink some floral teaâ€”maybe a nice lavender with lemon?

activities.text: Keep an eye out for bunnies everywhere
